forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn unfurls its gentle embrace, Downtown San Francisco awakens beneath a muted sky, where drizzle whispers through the cool air, carrying the scent of the Pacific. The temperature clings to a cozy 52 degrees, inviting a sense of quietude as the city gently rouses. A light southwest breeze stirs the slumbering streets, but no significant fog blankets the horizon just yet. Instead, a soft layer of clouds casts a delicate veil over the landmarks, while the Golden Gate Bridge quietly hovers, partially obscured, as if to deepen the city’s mystique.

Throughout the day, expect the drizzle to linger until mid-morning, eventually yielding to patches of sunlight that peek through the clouds. The high will dip slightly, accentuating a crisp afternoon with temperatures settling around 58 degrees. As the winds dance playfully, gusting up to 21 mph, one might well consider layering their attire—a lighter jacket over a long-sleeved shirt will suit the shifting conditions. For those yearning to embrace this lovely day, a stroll along the waterfront or a quiet visit to one of the city’s many cozy coffee shops may be the ideal remedy—a gentle balance of warmth and exploration in this beautiful urban sanctuary.
